concept.title: 570.117-1 Federal leadership in environmental, energy, and economic performance.

conbody.p: In order to create a clean energy economy that will increase our Nationâ€™s prosperity, promote energy security, protect the interests of taxpayers, and safeguard the health of our environment, GSA will accomplish all requirements of E.O. 13514 that apply to lease acquisition.
